page.title: 11RECREATION IN CRANAGE
page.content: Most of the homes have gardens and our survey showed that most people enjoy gardening. They grow flowers, friut and vegetables. There are no theatres or cinemas locally and people have to travel to neighbouring town or into Manchester for entertainment of that sort . Some people we talked to do however belong to the choral or dramatic societies nearby. For people who like sport there is a large Leisure Centre attached to the Comrehensive school. There are various clubs run there inclucling squash and gymnastics. However if we want to swim we have to go to sandbach or congleton. There is also Cranage club which is used during the week for the local playgroup.In the evenings it is used for social events,brownies and cubs.
